alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Phillips, northeastern Petroleum, west central Garfield and southwestern Valley Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 814 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Fourchette to 17 miles north of Winnett. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fourchette, Devils Creek Rec Area, U L Bend Rec Area, Crooked Creek Rec Area, Brusett, Content, Sun Prairie and Valentine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
